summary: Fully Craftable Scoped Glass Bow - Designed for Immersive, Crosshairless Sniper Gameplay
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightgrey][center][b]<-------<< [/color][color=Greenyellow]SCOPED GLASS BOW[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[b]The Scoped Glass Bow is a Bow Weapon with Scope - Designed for immersive Sniper Gameplay without HUD-Crosshair[/b]

[url=http://i.imgur.com/6kK8Srj.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/cf2tMMd.jpg[/img][/url]
KlICK on THE PICTURES to see them BIG!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/jTJTlqn.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/ES7INRL.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://i.imgur.com/PQEz6Lu.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/IsjtgB9.jpg[/img][/url]
[/center]


[b]<-------<< Video >>------->[/b]

Thanks to Sloth.
(old version)
[youtube]_-smeVOKLRw[/youtube]


[b]<-------<< [/color][color=Greenyellow]INSTALLL-UNISTALL[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

NEXUS MOD MANAGER (Recommended):

[u]Install[/u]
1.)Choose One Main File
2.)Download and Install the choosen Main File
3.)Play and have Fun!

======= ======= =======

[b]Folder Structure[/b] looks like this:

Sniper Glass bow:
data/meshes/weapons/sniper sight bows/glass/glassbowskinned.nif
data/textures/weapons/sniper sight bows/glass/....-here are the textures

Glass Bow Of the Stag Prince:
data/meshes/weapons/sniper sight bows/glass/stag prince/GlassbowStagPrince.nif
data/textures/weapons/sniper sight bows/glass/stag prince...



[u]Manual UNINSTALL:[/u]
Just remove the Files.




[b]<-------<< [/color][color=Greenyellow]How To Get In Game[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[u]Crafting:[/u]
The Scoped Glass Bow is fully craftable. It has a black reticle.

[u]Obtain:[/u]
The Glass Bow Of the Stag Prince can be obtained from Falas Selvayn at the Ramshackle Trading Post. (like vanilla) It has one green ring and a green glowing reticle.

[u]Cheating (Console Comand):[/u]
open the console with ^
1.)type: [b]help "Scoped glass"[/b] The Scoped Glass Bow will show up with it's id
2.)type: [b]player.additem xxxxxxxx 1[/b] (instead of x type the numbers of the id - the 1 at the end stands for the number of bows that you will get)
To cheat the Glass Bow Of the Stag Prince Type: [b]help stag[/b] (or help "Glass Bow Of the Stag Prince" if it does not show up)



[b]<-------<< [/color][color=Greenyellow]RECOMMENDATIONS[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[u]MODS:[/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11941/?]ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks[/url]

+DISABLE the HUD completely (this is how i play) or instead use one or both of the suggested mods below.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222/?]Immersive Hud[/url]
To turn crosshair and/or sneak eye off (this mod offers many great options)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url]
To move the sneak eye down on your screen between health and magica bar download "oblivion style sneak eye" (works great in combination with iHud)

<-------<< >>------->

[u]SKYRIM.INI TWEAKS[/u](make a backup at first!)

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=+2][color=red]Check Out the Pack![/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url][/size]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45304/?]Kinematic ENB Extensive[/url] is used in all pictures.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[url=http://i.imgur.com/phKOauL.jpg][img]http://i.imgur.com/JDqSUdr.jpg[/img][/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you enjoy this mod please [/color][color=Greenyellow]Endorse[/color][color=Lightgrey] it! It gives me the motivation to keep on modding.
Have Fun! :)

OutLaw666
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
author: OutLaw666

files.name: Sniper Glass Bow No Dragonborn DLC
files.changelogHtml:
-New Ring Meshes (Polygon errors fixed + rings are a litte bit smaller for more "elegance")
-New Ring Textures
-Arm meshes improved (no ugly clipping through bow main mesh)
-New Lens mesh (less polygones)
-Environment map for glasslens added
-Improved textures + UV mapping(no stretched textures)
-Performance inproved
-Glass Bow of the Stag Prince replacer added!
